alert.note: Alert for Eastern Rensselaer; Western Rensselaer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 1:30PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Rensselaer County through 200 PM EDT... At 130 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wyantskill, or over Troy, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Troy, Green Island, Grafton, Berlin, Wyantskill, Center Brunswick, Wynantskill, West Sand Lake, North Greenbush, Brunswick, Pittstown, Poestenkill, South Troy, East Poestenkill, Quackenkill, Albia, Sycaway, Eastmor, Barberville and Tamarack. This includes Interstate 787 near exit 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
